description:
What you have been waiting for. A course designed to teach you the fundamentals of making your own bodice sloper/block. I'm excited to deliver this to you.

This course is designed for:

- Fashion students.
- Industry professionals.
- Hobbyists.
- Fashion enthusiasts.

We will cover:

- Pattern cutting basics.
- Sloper construction by flat pattern making.
- Sloper construction by draping on a mannequin/dress form.
- Introducing you to blocks and slopers (the tools of the trade).
- Basic garment construction.

All of the lectures are delivered by video. At the end of the course you will be ready to move forward in your pattern cutting journey.

See you on the inside.
title: How to create a Sloper/Block from scratch
